long_description: The Thule Traverse Short Roof Adapter extends the crossbar spread on vehicles with narrow or greatly curved roof lines. Compatible with Thule Rapid Aero and Thule Square load bars. Requires 4 Thule Traverse or 4 Rapid Traverse feet and 2 Thule Rapid Aero or 2 square bars (all sold separately). Wide crossbar spread allows for even distribution of weight and more secure transport of larger items. Locks to roof with Thule One-Key(TM) system (sold separately).
short_description: The Thule Traverse Short Roof Adapter extends the crossbar spread on vehicles with narrow or greatly curved roof lines.
